name: Succubuzz APP
description:
Story
If you received an app that could control the actions of others, what would YOU do with it?

After encountering a mysterious person at the airport, you check your phone only to find a suspicious new app installed. The app is triggered by any close contact with a woman. What it does… goes beyond your wildest dreams.

Gameplay
Solve the “Twist” and “Wave Sync” mini-games to correctly analyze your target’s brain waves, and get them to do your bidding!❤️




Features
Heart-pounding H-scenes from unexpected scenarios
Four uniquely cute target characters, each with their own stories & scenes
8+ H-CGs and Animations



Use the Succubuzz App and live out your fantasies!
